item.title: Facts Formats
item.description: Datalog and Tuple-Attribute and Datalog are two languages used in current factbase implementations. Tuple-Attribute Language Tuple-Attribute file can contain following four sections: SCHEME TUPLE: SCHEME ATTRIBUTE: FACT TUPLE: FACT ATTRIBUTE: which are interpreted as in the following grid: Tuple Attribute Scheme Allowed Edges Allowed Attributes Fact Actual Edges Actual Attributes SCHEME TUPLE defines allowed edges in the typed graph, e.
